subject: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B.N)
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa way,
Central Business District, Cadastral zone, Abuja
Dear Honorable Contractor,
Kindly claim your contract inheritance fund value at $8.500,000,00,
Please ignore if already claimed.  To know more about our services,
please respond.
Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Yours faithfully.
Dr Olayemi Cardoso,
Governor Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN

subject: Re:   Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Dr Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the contract fund value. I appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. Could you please provide me with more information about the services offered by the Central Bank of Nigeria? I would like to understand how your organization can assist me further.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
From: Dr Olayemi Cardoso,
Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B.N)
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa way,
Central Business District, Cadastral zone, Abuja.

Dear Mila,

I have received your letter and the contents noted. However, the CBN is
here to give you a smoother and faster service in your fund transfer to
your account. Before the CBN will do the wire transfer to your account, The
Fund Release Order Approval Document from the Federal Ministry of Finance
must be secured by you as the beneficiary.

Meanwhile, to secure the approval will cost you a sum of US$3,850.00, Three
Thousand Eight Hundred and Fifty United States Dollars Only.

Kindly respond with your full bank details where to transfer your fund and
i will direct you to the account to send the US$3,850.00 to secure your
Fund Release Order Approval which authorises the CBN to pay you immediately
after the processing of your fund released and secured.


Yours Sincerely,

Dr Olayemi Cardoso,
Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B.N)

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to assist me with the fund transfer to my account. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more information about the Fund Release Order Approval Document? What is its purpose and why is it necessary for the wire transfer?

2. Is there any way to reduce the cost of securing the approval document? The amount mentioned, US Three Thousand Eight Hundred and Fifty Dollars, seems quite high.

3. Can you assure me that once I secure the approval document and transfer the funds, the wire transfer will be completed smoothly and without any further charges or delays?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
From: Dr Olayemi Cardoso,
Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B.N)
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa way,
Central Business District, Cadastral zone, Abuja.

Attn: Mila,

How are you doing? This is to bring to your notice, this great opportunity
for you to claim your fund. The man in charge to issue your fund release
approval, I have discussed with him, He is ready to accept you pay $1,850
to enable him approve your fund release and transfer to you.

Then immediately you confirm payment in your account, you will send back
the balance of $2000, If you are ready to accept this offer, get back to me
for the receiver details for you to send the $1,850 immediately and your
fund transfer will be effective also.

Yours Sincerely,

Dr Olayemi Cardoso,
Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B.N)

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate you bringing this opportunity to my attention. Could you please provide me with more details about the fund that I am eligible to claim? How much is the fund and what is the reason behind its release?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the person in charge of issuing the fund release approval. What is their name and position? How can I be sure that they are authorized to handle such matters?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to assist me with the fund transfer to my account. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more information about the Fund Release Order Approval Document? What is its purpose and why is it necessary for the wire transfer?

2. Is there any way to reduce the cost of securing the approval document? The amount mentioned, US Three Thousand Eight Hundred and Fifty Dollars, seems quite high.

3. Can you clarify how long the processing of the fund release and securing will take once I have sent the payment for the approval document?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mila,

Thank you also for responding to my message about your contract inheritance
fund release and transfer to you.

Well since 10/5/2023. I, Olayemi Cardoso is the Governor of the Central
Bank of Nigeria (CBN).according to the record which i meet in this office
our payment file, there is a total amount of US10.5M under your name
waiting for you to come forward claim for it`s release and transfer to you .

Meanwhile, the person in charge of issuing the fund release approval is the
Minister of finance Mr Wale Edun, appointed by President Bola Tinubu on 16
August 2023. He is incharge and authorized to handle this matter for duely
verification and confirmation of the beneficiary and release of the fund
immediately, therefore the fund release order approval grants final
authorization to the Central Bank of Nigeria to make payment to beneficiary
account by swift wire transfer.

In this regard, you are hereby directed to complete the following
information, which will help me trace your file to finalize your payment
into your account shortly.

Name:...........................
Address:........................
Tel/Mobile:.....................
Age:..............................
Marital Status:.................
Occupation:.....................
Annual Income:.................
Next of kin:......................
Total Amount:...................
Receiving bank:.................
Address:..........................
Tel/Fax:...........................
A/c No:............................
Routing No:.......................
Swift Code / Iban No:............
Account Name:....................
Scan copy of International passport copy / Drivers Incense............

Thank You,

Mr Olayemi Cardoso
Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for your response and providing me with more information about the contract fund release and transfer. I appreciate your assistance in this matter.

I understand that the Minister of Finance, Mr. Wale Edun, is responsible for issuing the fund release approval. Could you please tell me more about his role and how he ensures that the process is carried out properly?

Additionally, I would like to know what steps are involved in completing the necessary requirements for tracing my file and finalizing the payment into my account. Could you please provide me with a detailed explanation?

Thank you once again for your help.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mila,

The Minister of Finance Mr Wale Edun, will give the approval which ordered
CBN to carry out a swift wire transfer of the total sum to your account and
will ensure that the fund is paid accordingly without any addition or
subtraction, for there will be a supervisory and monitoring team till the
fund leaves to your account successfully.

The requirements are very necessary for record purposes and to confirm you
have received the fund and to control fraud since some foreign
beneficiaries after payment, do come back claiming another payment.

Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,
Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that the fund transfer is carried out smoothly and without any additional charges. It's good to know that there will be a monitoring team in place to ensure the funds reach my account safely.

Could you please provide me with more details about the necessary steps I need to take? I want to make sure that everything is done correctly and that there are no delays or complications in receiving the funds.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by some foreign individuals coming back after payment claiming another payment? How can we prevent such fraudulent activities?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mila,

Kindly provide the information required and pay the $1,850 for the approval
of your fund release and transfer to your account successfully and without
failure, then immediately you receive your funds, you will send the balance
of $2000 . About the individuals that are defrauding the government,a
precautionary measure has been taken to trap anyone involved in such acts.

Thank You.

Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,
Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message regarding the approval and transfer of funds to my account. Could you please provide more details about the required payment for the approval? I want to make sure I understand the process correctly.

Additionally, could you explain how the balance of funds should be sent? Is there a specific method or platform that I need to use?

I'm glad to hear that measures have been taken to trap those involved in fraudulent activities. It's important to ensure the safety and security of financial transactions.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mila,

If you send your fund release order approval fee today and the minister of
finance confirms it, the approval document will be quickly made ready and
sent to CBN to copy to you for your confirmation.

It will take CBN 72hrs to wire the total fund into your account
successfully. You are paying $1,850 first, then immediately you confirm
your $10.5M paid into your account, you will send back the balance of $2000
making it the round figure $3,850 , And if you have the capacity to pay the
approval fee of $3,850 at once, you are free to do so and your fund will be
send to your account correctly.

Thank You.

Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,
Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the fund release order approval fee. I just have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please explain in more detail what the fund release order approval fee is for? 
2. How can I be sure that once I pay the fee, the approval document will be sent to me promptly?
3. Is there a specific timeframe within which CBN will wire the total fund into my account after I confirm my payment?
4. Can you provide any references or testimonials from individuals who have successfully received their funds through this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mila,

The fund release order approval document fee, when you pay this fee, It
means you are the original beneficiary to the fund, an urgent attention
will be given to you, Without delay the Minister will give his approval
which is the authority the CBN have to pay into your account as it will be
stated in the approval order documents.

It is 100% sure that a copy will be sent to you for the CBN will require it
from you for a confirmation before they wire the fund into your account.

Yes there is a specific timeframe, immediately the CBN received the release
order from the finance minister, within 72hrs you have to confirm payment
in your account. Any delay will result in questioning the CBN.

If you need some individuals that have received their payment, I will look
for their documents and send them to you for you to be sure.


Thank You.

Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,
Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your assistance in helping me understand the process better. I have a few follow-up questions, if you don't mind.

1. Could you please explain in more detail what the fund release order approval document fee is for? Why is it necessary to pay this fee?

2. How can I be sure that paying this fee will guarantee that I am the original recipient of the funds? Are there any other steps or requirements involved?

3. You mentioned that there is a specific timeframe within which I need to confirm payment in my account. Could you please clarify what that timeframe is and what happens if there is a delay?

4. If possible, I would appreciate it if you could provide some examples of individuals who have successfully received their payments after paying the fee. It would help me gain more confidence in the process.

Thank you once again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Mila

subject: Re: Central Bank Of Nigeria (C.B
body:
Dear Mila,
please i don't accept or answer irrelevant question.
I have provided you with full details.

Thank You,
Mr Cardoso
